SEARCH
Package com.simcraft.entities.enemies

Class Enemy

java.lang.Object
com.simcraft.entities.Entity
com.simcraft.entities.MobileEntity
com.simcraft.entities.enemies.Enemy
All Implemented Interfaces:
Renderable, Updateable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Lecturer, Student, Yapper
public abstract class Enemy extends MobileEntity
Represents an enemy in the game.

This class extends MobileEntity and includes functionality for attacking the player/Ali.

  • Field Details

    • attackTimerMs

      protected long attackTimerMs
      The duration (in milliseconds) an enemy can continuously attack before needing to cool down.

    • elapsedAttackTimeMs

      protected long elapsedAttackTimeMs
      The elapsed time (in milliseconds) of the current attack wave.

    • attackCooldownMs

      protected long attackCooldownMs
      The cooldown duration (in milliseconds) before the enemy can attack again after an attack wave ends.

    • elapsedAttackCooldownMs

      protected long elapsedAttackCooldownMs
      The elapsed time (in milliseconds) since the enemy started cooling down.

    • lastUpdateTime

      protected long lastUpdateTime
      The timestamp (in milliseconds) of the last update call.

    • random

      protected Random random
      Internally used random numbe generator.

    • moveDelay

      protected int moveDelay
      The cooldown duration before the enemy can move again after a previous movement opportunity.

    • hasCollided

      protected boolean hasCollided

    • timePenalty

      protected int timePenalty
      How many seconds to remove from the timer if Ali collides with this enemy.

    • isIdling

      protected boolean isIdling
      Whether the enemy is currently idling (not moving).

    • chanceToIdle

      protected double chanceToIdle
      The percentage chance that the enemy starts idling if left uninterrupted. Should Ali enter within range, this should be ignored in favour of an attack.

    • idleDuration

      protected long idleDuration
      How many milliseconds the enemy should remain idle for if left uninterrupted. Should Ali enter within range, this should be ignored in favour of an attack.

    • detectionRadius

      protected int detectionRadius
      How close Ali must be to the enemy to trigger an attack.

      Parameters:

    • canAttack

      public boolean canAttack()
      Checks whether the enemy can perform an attack.
      Returns:
      true if the enemy has a bullet spawner, is not on cooldown, and has remaining attack time in the current wave.

    • isOnAttackCooldown

      public boolean isOnAttackCooldown()
      Checks if the attack cooldown is active.
      Returns:
      true if the attack cooldown has not expired, false otherwise.

    • attack

      public void attack()
      Performs an attack if the enemy is allowed to do so. Automatically stops attacking when the attack timer runs out.

    • reverseMovementDirection

      public void reverseMovementDirection()
      Reverses the enemy's movement direction.

    • setRandomDirection

      public void setRandomDirection()
      Randomly sets the enemy's movement direction.

    • move

      public void move()
      Updates the enntity's current position using their current movement speed values.

      Extends MobileEntity.move() by ensuring the enemy still within screen boundaries.

      Overrides:
      move in class MobileEntity

    • update

      public void update()
      Updates the state of the entity, including movement and attack state.
      Specified by:
      update in interface Updateable
      Overrides:
      update in class MobileEntity

    • correctPosition

      protected void correctPosition()
      Ensures the entity remains within screen boundaries.

      Extends Entity.correctPosition() by adding vertical bounce behavior when the enemy reaches the screen's edges.

      Overrides:
      correctPosition in class Entity
